name: RDrift (Brackeys game jam n°3)
description:
Reach the finish line using your hoverboard while deactivating the doors on your way and collecting coins as quickly as possible to unlock the exit before the time runs out.

Arrow Keys / WASD : Move and rotate the hoverboard

Left click : Charge your jump
Right click : Drift
Middle Click : Pause

Made by Quasar47 for the Brackeys game jam n°3
